easyStandard.skull: -X. X is the highest amount of doom on an agenda in play.
easyStandard.cultist: Reveal another token. If this token is revealed during an attack or evasion attempt against an enemy with doom on it, this skill test automatically fails instead.
easyStandard.tablet: Reveal another token. If you fail, place 1 doom on each agenda.
easyStandard.elderThing: -2. If you fail, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a _Byakhee_ enemy and draw it.

hardExpert.skull: -X. X is the total amount of doom on agendas in play.
hardExpert.cultist: Reveal another token. If there is an enemy with 1 or more doom on it at your location, this test automatically fails instead.
hardExpert.tablet: Reveal another token. If you do not succeed by at least 1, place 1 doom on each agenda.
hardExpert.elderThing: -3. If you fail, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a _Byakhee_ enemy and draw it.
